meanings.definition: A large citrus fruit with a thick rind and sweet, juicy flesh.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed eating the pumelo at breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The pumelo was so juicy and refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The pumelo rolled off the table and surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and sweet as a ripe pumelo.
meanings.sent5: The pumelo's vibrant color made it stand out in the fruit basket.

meanings.definition: The tree that produces the pumelo fruit.
meanings.sent1: The pumelo tree in our garden provides shade in the summer.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new pumelo tree near the fence.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels love to climb the pumelo tree and play.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the pumelo tree reached towards the sky like outstretched arms.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the pumelo tree blossoms filled the air with sweetness.
